manpage.title: _kbhit

description.para: Checks the console for keyboard input.

return.para: _kbhit returns a nonzero value if a key has been pressed. Otherwise, it returns 0.

remarks.para: The _kbhit function checks the console for a recent keystroke. If the function returns a nonzero value,then a keystroke waits in the buffer. The program can then call _getch to get the keystroke.
